title: "Covid-19 Updates (select regions)"
output: html_document
---

## Deaths, 7-day Moving Average


```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=F, message=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
data <- read_csv("regions.csv")
ggplotly(ggplot(data = data, mapping = aes(x = date, y = rollave7.deaths, color = region)) + geom_smooth(se=FALSE) + scale_y_log10() + theme_minimal() + labs(y = "7-day moving average", x = "Date", color = "Regions"))
```
